package:
ecl_sigslots_lite 0.50.0
This avoids use of dynamic storage (malloc/new) and thread safety (mutexes) to provide a very simple sigslots implementation that can be used for *very* embedded development.
Daniel Stonier BSD http://wiki.ros.org/ecl_sigslots_lite https://github.com/stonier/ecl_lite https://github.com/stonier/ecl_lite/issues Daniel Stonier -->
